name: Tap the Light (thankgames)
description:
Test your vision and brain! Find the light-colored tile and tap it as quickly as you can.

Features:

- Easy to learn

- Unlimited levels

- Fascinating music

- Save your high score automatically

- Upload and share your high score

- Exercise your brain

- Completely free, no in-app purchase

- No third party ads. There is only one image linking to our other games

Words from players

- Super fun and addictive! It's my go-to game on my phone.

- It's easy and fun for all ages and it's a great time passer.

- I achieved level 157, still playing hard.

Website: http://www.thankgames.com

Contact us: support@thankgames.com
